roleset.name: to repel and/or disgust
roleset.note: REPULSE-V NOTES: Frame by Claire (from repulse.01-v)

role.descr: Instrument or Manner if separate from arg 0

example.name: That is repulsive...
example.text: In an attempt to disgust and *-1 repulse these vile oppressors, I-1 once again induced myself to vomit on their favorite chair.
